channel.title: Messed up source...or coding faults
channel.description:
I was making a new home for my server today and i found the best place ever...do i made it non wild (i had another sever and i remember how to make them...but the home area is still wild...but the whole other server isn't...just to check i even went off the MAP!...still safe.....any help
te code i used was; [code] || (absX >= 3277 && absX <= 3286 && absY >= 9198 && absY <= 9192)[/code]in the nonwild boolean
i have teamviewer im glad to say so if anyone thinks they can do this just pm me...(if im still awake)
:confused: :confused:
Thanks NsF PuRe :D
